messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: culture and freedom (long, rambly,history and speculation)
messages.msgSnippet: ... Excuse me while I puke!  Those are probably the same people who believe that kids won t grown up to be decent people unless they re spanked. Tia
messages.messageBody:
> We tried to pass a less restrictive homeschool law in PA, and it was
> tabled at the end of November. Part of the problem is that there
> were some homeschoolers who actually lobbied against it, saying that
> if they didn't have the state to be accountable to, they might not do
> a good job educating their children.

Excuse me while I puke! Those are probably the same people who believe that
kids won't grown up to be decent people unless they're spanked.
Tia
